document_data.name: Thelynn'ss
document_data.mainbody: '''Thelynn'ss''' was a [[drow]] captain, who acted under the orders of the [[Bhaalspawn]], [[Sendai]].
document_data.Possessions: The drow captain fought with enchanted [[scimitar]]s and wore an [[amulet of cheetah speed]], as well carrying a [[Potion of healing|healing potion]].
document_data.History: Thelynn'ss was appointed by Sendai to guard her compound. She was found in the barracks of Sendai's enclave, and commanded several drow fighters. The captain may have been killed by [[Gorion's Ward|Gorion's Ward's]] party, upon intruding into the barracks. She was also in possession of the drow guard's key, which opened many areas of the complex.
